label: Hubert Home 3
description:
Looking over Daniel, Hubert sees him getting bullied, but then through the help of an Okinawan karate instructor, overcomes his problems through a martial arts tournament.  Well maybe Daniel isn't quite the right fit, so Hubert goes back to the crystal ball.

Hit 1 to pick Harry.
Hit 2 to pick John.

Hit 0 to quit.
